name: options
description: The options to display as checkboxes.

name: aria-label
description: Accessible label for the checkbox group.

name: aria-labelledby
description: ID of the element that labels this checkbox group.

name: className
description: Additional CSS classes for the root element.

name: color
description: The color scheme of the checkboxes.

name: defaultValue
description:
Names of the checkboxes in the group that should be initially ticked.

To render a controlled checkbox group, use the `value` prop instead.

name: disabled
description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

name: orientation
description: The layout orientation of the checkbox group.

name: value
description:
Names of the checkboxes in the group that should be ticked.

To render an uncontrolled checkbox group, use the `defaultValue` prop instead.

name: variant
description: The visual style of the checkboxes.
